english: I can not have such behavior in my house .
chinese: 我不能容忍家中有这种行为。

english: He won't stand any nonsense from the staff .
chinese: 他决不容忍员工胡作非为。

english: I could not bear for him to stay elsewhere .
chinese: 我不能容忍他待在别处。

english: She will not put up with foolish behavior .
chinese: 她说她决不容忍荒唐的行为。

english: Life has become unbearable to her .
chinese: 对于她来说，生活变得不堪容忍。
容忍造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: I wo n't stand for this insolence .
chinese: 我决不容忍这种傲慢无礼的行为。

english: Citizens who behave themselves are tolerated .
chinese: 奉公守法的公民受到容忍。

english: She says she will stand no nonsense .
chinese: 她说她决不容忍荒唐的行为。

english: I wo n't stick your rudeness any longer .
chinese: 我再也不能容忍你这种粗暴行为了。
你是一个令人头痛，叫人无法容忍的人。

english: After about three hours it became unbearable .
chinese: 大约三个小时后就难以容忍了。

english: She was for the fib, but not the lie .
chinese: 她容忍自己说点小谎，但不愿扯弥天大谎

english: I have no patience with his roughness .
He had to tolerate his wife's mother .
I have been so far forbearing with you .
